page.title: 19Prestwood Children's Height
page.content:
We asked children in our Survey to indicate their height. These are the results: {Average Height in Metres}
Age: Girls Boys
8-8.11 1.28 1.31 9-9.11 1.34 1.38 10-10.11 1.37 1.44 11-11.11 1.48 1.49
Although in each year, boys were on average taller than girls, the eleven year old girls were much taller than the ten year old girls. We graphed the values, and there's a {sudden} increase in their height between 10 and 11, but the boys increase in height is gradual and even throughout this age range. Maybe the boys will have a sudden increase in growth later.
